name: Mahou Go demo
description:
Mahou Go is a modern 3D sidescroller. Inspired by the classics games and with a anime style, you play as Lucca, a magical girl with a pure and kind heart. See the world through her eyes, and help her in a journey to save the world from the darkness: a story full of adventures wait you!

• This (first) demo shows the basic gameplay. The full game contains more features, like a magic and shop systems.

Developed by Raniery Seles.
